name: Legacy Bits
description:
A world is in an evil machine domination. Reach to the core with a simple one-button gameplay within a time limit and convert the evil machine into your control.

Reach the core earlier and/or collect all the fuel to get more orb bonuses after reaching the core.

Control
  • Mouse/Space/Z: Charge forward/Stop charging forward
Note

- The game is still in progress, but the demo is available now. Let me know what you think of my game. Feel free to give feedback from part you love, like, dislike, hate, to suggestion ;-).
